title: 3. Props
content:
## Props The component should receive a props parameter in order to map props ```jsx import React from 'react' export default function Card(props) { console.log(props); return (
{props.location} View on Google maps

{props.title}

{props.startDate} - {props.endDate}

{props.description}

) } ``` ### Pass Props ````jsx // Select Data const data = 1 // Pass Prop To Child Component ```` ### Receive Props in Child ````jsx // Use Destructuring to receive props of same name const List = ({people}) => { console.log(people) return (

list component

); ````
